title: The Vampire's Bard
description: Dearg-Due, the famous Irish Red Bloodsucker, has waited for centuries for her love to be reborn. Torn from her arms and forced to marry against her will, Dearg takes desperate action and is reborn as a vampire. With only a few words of prophesy to guide her, she follows a mysterious music to Hollywood. Shari is a musician just back from a long tour, when the sound of an invisible harp intrudes on her acoustic encore at Hollywoodâ€™s Club of Thieves. Can the song bring ancient lovers together again in a new place and time? Or is it too late for the Vampire and her Bard?
author: Kate Richards
